mapper.select: SELECT fpf.production_type, fpf.operator_id, op.name AS operator_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, CURRENT_DATE, fpf.action_time) as action_time, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, CURRENT_DATE, COALESCE(fpf.finish_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) as finish_time FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN operator op ON op.operator_id = fpf.operator_id WHERE fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND action_time >= CURRENT_DATE

SELECT fpf.fact_pf_key, fpf.operator_id, operator.name AS operator_name, fpf.production_type, pw.warehouse_no, pw.`key`, fpf.material_id FROM fact_production_feature fpf LEFT JOIN partial_warehouse pw ON pw.key = fpf.partial_warehouse_key JOIN operator ON fpf.operator_id = operator.operator_id WHERE fpf.finish_time IS NULL AND fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id}

SELECT SUM(temp.recept) FROM ( SELECT pwd.key, v_partial.spec_kind, CASE WHEN pbs.box_count = -1 THEN 1 * pbs.recept ELSE CEIL(SUM(pwd.quantity) / pbs.box_count) * pbs.recept END AS recept FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE fpf.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key} GROUP BY v_partial.spec_kind ) temp

SELECT SUM(temp.recept) FROM ( SELECT pwd.key, v_partial.spec_kind, CASE WHEN pbs.box_count = -1 THEN 1 * pbs.recept ELSE CEIL(SUM(pwd.quantity) / pbs.box_count) * pbs.recept END AS recept FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND fpf.production_type IN (10,11) AND fpf.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND fpf.finish_time IS NOT NULL GROUP BY pwd.key,v_partial.spec_kind ) temp

SELECT SUM(pwd.quantity * pbs.collation) FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pbs.on_shelf < 0 AND fpf.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}

SELECT SUM(pwd.collation_quantity * pbs.collation) FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.fact_pf_key = pwd.fact_pf_key JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND fpf.production_type = 20 AND pbs.on_shelf < 0 AND fpf.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND fpf.finish_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(pwd.quantity) * pbs.collation FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pbs.on_shelf > 0 AND fpf.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}

SELECT COUNT(pwd.collation_quantity) * pbs.collation FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.fact_pf_key = pwd.fact_pf_key JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND fpf.production_type = 21 AND pbs.on_shelf > 0 AND fpf.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND fpf.finish_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT SUM(pbs.unpack * CASE WHEN CEIL(pwd.quantity / partial_unpack.split_quantity) <= 1 THEN 0 ELSE CEIL(pwd.quantity / partial_unpack.split_quantity) END ) FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind JOIN partial_unpack ON partial_unpack.partial_id = pwd.partial_id WHERE fpf.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}

SELECT SUM(fpw.quantity * pbs.unpack) FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN fact_partial_warehouse fpw ON fpf.fact_pf_key = fpw.fact_pf_key JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = fpw.spec_kind WHERE fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND fpf.production_type = 30 AND fpf.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND fpf.finish_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(pwd.quantity) * pbs.on_shelf FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pbs.on_shelf > 0 AND fpf.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}

SELECT COUNT(fpw.quantity) * pbs.on_shelf FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN fact_partial_warehouse fpw ON fpf.fact_pf_key = fpw.fact_pf_key JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = fpw.spec_kind WHERE fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND fpf.production_type = 40 AND pbs.on_shelf > 0 AND fpf.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND fpf.finish_time IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM fact_production_feature WHERE operator_id = #{operator_id} AND production_type = #{production_type} AND action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND finish_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT
SUM(pwd.collation_quantity * pbs.collation)
SUM(pwd.collation_quantity * pbs.collation)
SUM(fpw.quantity * pbs.unpack * partial_unpack.split_quantity)
SUM(fpw.quantity * pbs.on_shelf)
FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key
AND fpf.fact_pf_key = pwd.fact_pf_key
JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind
JOIN partial_unpack ON partial_unpack.partial_id = pwd.partial_id
JOIN fact_partial_warehouse fpw ON fpf.fact_pf_key = fpw.fact_pf_key AND fpw.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind
WHERE fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND fpf.production_type = #{production_type}
AND fpf.finish_time IS NULL
AND fpf.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND fpf.finish_time IS NOT NULL
AND pbs.on_shelf < 0
AND pbs.on_shelf > 0
AND pbs.on_shelf > 0

SELECT SUM(temp.box) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN pbs.box_count = -1 THEN 1 ELSE CEIL(sum(pwd.quantity / pbs.box_count)) END AS box FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND fpf.production_type = 10 AND fpf.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND fpf.finish_time IS NOT NULL group by pwd.key, v_partial.spec_kind ) temp

SELECT SUM(pwd.collation_quantity) FROM fact_production_feature pfp JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON pfp.fact_pf_key = pwd.fact_pf_key JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pfp.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND pfp.production_type = #{production_type} AND pfp.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND pfp.finish_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT SUM(fpw.quantity) FROM fact_production_feature pfp JOIN fact_partial_warehouse fpw ON pfp.fact_pf_key = fpw.fact_pf_key WHERE pfp.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND pfp.production_type = #{production_type} AND pfp.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND pfp.finish_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT warehouse_no, step, EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM partial_warehouse_detail WHERE fact_pf_key IS NOT NULL AND `key` = partial_warehouse.key) AS collation, EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN fact_partial_warehouse fpw ON fpw.fact_pf_key = fpf.fact_pf_key WHERE fpf.partial_warehouse_key = partial_warehouse.key AND fpf.production_type = 30 ) AS unpack, EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN fact_partial_warehouse fpw ON fpw.fact_pf_key = fpf.fact_pf_key WHERE fpf.partial_warehouse_key = partial_warehouse.key AND fpf.production_type = 40 ) AS on_shelf FROM partial_warehouse WHERE step < 3
SELECT COUNT(material_id) FROM fact_production_feature pfp WHERE operator_id = #{operator_id} AND production_type = #{production_type} AND action_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND finish_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT material.omr_notifi_no, v_position.process_code, pf.action_time FROM production_feature pf JOIN v_position ON v_position.position_id = pf.position_id JOIN material ON material.material_id = pf.material_id JOIN material_partial ON material_partial.material_id = material.material_id AND material_partial.occur_times = 1 WHERE v_position.process_code IN(252,321,504) AND pf.finish_time IS NULL
SELECT CEIL(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,action_time,NOW())) / 60 ) FROM fact_production_feature WHERE fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}
